parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the GA instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: State
parameters.description:
The status of the GA instance. Valid values:

*   **init**: The GA instance is being initialized.
*   **active**: The GA instance is available.
*   **configuring**: The GA instance is being configured.
*   **binding**: The GA instance is being associated.
*   **unbinding**: The GA instance is being disassociated.
*   **deleting**: The GA instance is being deleted.
*   **finacialLocked**: The GA instance is locked due to overdue payments.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the GA instance.
